document_data.name: Falstaff
document_data.mainbody: '''Falstaff''' was a [[doomguide]] who lived in the city of [[Neverwinter]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
He was one a member of the contingent of Kelemvorite forces sent to investigate the [[Neverdeath Graveyard]] in [[Neverwinter]] ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1479}}. He and some of his fellows were lost in an area known as [[the Rift]] after an assault by [[undead]] and their [[Red Wizard]]s masters. Falstaff was killed by a volley of [[arrow]]s. 

Some time later [[Volahk|Doomguide Volahk]] hired an adventurer to find his missing comrades in the city's graveyard district. After finding Falstaff's corpse, the adventurer burned it so that it could not be raised as an [[undead]] abomination by the [[Thay]]an [[necromancer]]s.
